means: （多用于参加舞会的）狂喜迷幻药

sentence.Network_en: Its gonna be ecstacy, this place was meant for me.
sentence.Network_cn: 它将变得狂喜, 这个地方对于我来说.

sentence.Network_en: In 1966, she published autobiography, Ecstacy and Me.
sentence.Network_cn: 1966年, 她出版了自传《我与“神魂颠倒”》.
